name: io.github.tan-yong-sheng/ai-vision-mcp
description: Vision MCP server that provides AI-powered image and video analysis using Google Gemini and Vertex AI

environment_variables.description: Provider for image analysis (google or vertex_ai)
environment_variables.name: IMAGE_PROVIDER

environment_variables.description: Provider for video analysis (google or vertex_ai)
environment_variables.name: VIDEO_PROVIDER

environment_variables.description: Google Gemini API key (required if using google provider)
environment_variables.name: GEMINI_API_KEY

environment_variables.description: Path to GCP service account JSON (required if using vertex_ai provider)
environment_variables.name: VERTEX_CREDENTIALS

environment_variables.description: GCS bucket name for Vertex AI uploads (required for vertex_ai provider)
environment_variables.name: GCS_BUCKET_NAME
